name: GameAssist
description:
GameAssist is a modular Roll20 API framework for the 5E 2014 sheet.

Core commands (GM only):
  • !ga-status – live metrics
  • !ga-enable <Module>
  • !ga-disable <Module>
  • !ga-config …

Bundled modules: CritFumble, NPCManager, ConcentrationTracker, NPCHPRoller.
TokenMod is strongly recommended.

## Changelog
• 0.1.1.1 – Quiet-startup flag, newline-safe logging
• 0.1.1.0 – Initial public release.
conflicts: Other scripts that modify NPC HP or use bar1_value
